name: Awoken (Jammed Game)
description:
You find yourself in a tomb of a long forgotten tyrant, woken by an unexplained earthquake.   Try to find your way out in this roguelike game, uncovering the mysteries of the cursed catacombs and its residents along the way.

Controls:
WASD To Move
Left Mouse Button to Shoot
Space to KICK!
